name: Gauge
desc: A view that shows a value within a range.

items.name: init<V>(value: V, in: ClosedRange<V>, label: () -> Label)
items.desc: Creates a gauge showing a value within a range and describes the gauge’s purpose and current value.

items.name: init<V>(value: V, in: ClosedRange<V>, label: () -> Label, currentValueLabel: () -> CurrentValueLabel)
items.desc: Creates a gauge showing a value within a range and that describes the gauge’s purpose and current value.

items.name: init<V>(value: V, in: ClosedRange<V>, label: () -> Label, currentValueLabel: () -> CurrentValueLabel, markedValueLabels: () -> MarkedValueLabels)
items.desc: Creates a gauge representing a value within a range.

items.name: init<V>(value: V, in: ClosedRange<V>, label: () -> Label, currentValueLabel: () -> CurrentValueLabel, minimumValueLabel: () -> BoundsLabel, maximumValueLabel: () -> BoundsLabel)
items.desc: Creates a gauge showing a value within a range and describes the gauge’s current, minimum, and maximum values.

items.name: init<V>(value: V, in: ClosedRange<V>, label: () -> Label, currentValueLabel: () -> CurrentValueLabel, minimumValueLabel: () -> BoundsLabel, maximumValueLabel: () -> BoundsLabel, markedValueLabels: () -> MarkedValueLabels)
items.desc: Creates a gauge representing a value within a range.

items.name: func gaugeStyle<S>(S) -> some View
items.desc: Sets the style for gauges within this view.

items.name: protocol GaugeStyle
items.desc: Defines the implementation of all gauge instances within a view hierarchy.

items.name: struct GaugeStyleConfiguration
items.desc: The properties of a gauge instance.

items.name: var body: some View
items.desc: The content and behavior of the view.

items.name: typealias Body
items.desc: The type of view representing the body of this view.

declaration: struct Gauge<Label, CurrentValueLabel, BoundsLabel, MarkedValueLabels> where Label : View, CurrentValueLabel : View, BoundsLabel : View, MarkedValueLabels : View
